name: The Mission (gamexdifficulty)
description:
The Mission is a little story platformer, where you control 3 Robots . Those Robots try to keep The Mission running to and as one Robot shuts down another awakes.

You can Move with  and  and Jump with Space. If you get stuck in some place just press R and you will be back to the last checkpoint.

This game was made by gamexdifficulty

for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 in python
